body.description: Product Description Swiffer Sweeper Wet mop textured cloths trap and lock dirt deep in cloth. They are safe to use on all finished floors* and have a scrubbing strip to remove tough spots. *Do not use on unfinished, oiled or waxed wooden boards, non-sealed tiles or carpeted floors because they may be water sensitive. Amazon.com Swiffer Sweeper wet mopping cloths are designed with a unique cleaning solution that works to dissolve tough spots, dirt and grime and pull it deep into the cloth and off your floors. It's even safe to use on wood floors*. *Do not use Swiffer Sweeper wet cloths on unfinished, oiled, or waxed wooden boards, non-sealed tiles or carpeted floors. swiffer sweeper dry cloth refillsUsing deep, dirt-grabbing ridges and grooves, our Dry Cloths pick up more dirt, dust, and hair than a broom. You'll notice the difference when you see an amazing clean on virtually any surface.Swiffer Sweeper wet cloth RefillsSwiffer Wet Mopping Cloths have powerful dirt-dissolving cleansers that pull dirt from surfaces and lock it away. *DO NOT use Swiffer Sweeper Wet Cloths on unfinished, oiled, waxed wooden boards, non-sealed tiles, or carpeted floors as they may be water sensitive.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Before we came along, cleaning was old-fashioned, backbreaking work. First you swept, and then you used a dustpan. Heavy buckets of water sloshed all over your just cleaned floors. And you kept those dirty tools in a closet where no one would see them. It was the turn of the millennium, and we saw an opportunity for change. In 1999, Swiffer pioneered achieving an amazing clean with little effort. It all started with our Trap & Lock Technology. You can see this technology in our Sweeper cloths that attract dirt, dust and hair off the floors. The dirt is trapped on the cloth, eliminating the use of brooms and dustpans.

For decades, people have used the simple mop and bucket to keep their floors clean. In 2001, Swiffer Sweepers were released and millions were introduced to a new, more convenient way to clean. The Swiffer Wet system offers an all-around better experience. It’s easy to use and uses less water than the typical mop and bucket. Households went from using gallons of water to ounces of solution to clean their floors. Our products were designed to make life easier, and today our focus remains the same. Knock out dirt in a single swipe and get back to what really matters in life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, Fresh, and Effective Floor Cleaning!
reviews.reviewText: Swiffer Sweeper Wet Mopping Pad Refills with Febreze Lavender Scent, 12 Count, are a game-changer when it comes to floor cleaning. Here's why I give them a glowing five-star review:Effortless Cleaning: Using these mopping pad refills is as easy as it gets. Just attach them to your Swiffer Sweeper and start cleaning. No buckets, no wringing, and no hassle.Lavender Bliss: The added Febreze Lavender Scent is a delightful touch. It not only cleans but leaves your floors smelling fresh and inviting. It's like a spa day for your home!Effective Cleaning: These mopping pads are efficient at picking up dirt, dust, and pet hair. They make your floors spotless, whether it's hardwood, tile, or linoleum.Convenience in Quantity: The pack of 12 is a generous supply, ensuring you're well-equipped for multiple cleaning sessions. It's a cost-effective choice for keeping your home consistently clean.No Residue or Streaks: These mopping pad refills leave no sticky residue or streaks behind. Your floors will look clean and shiny without any extra effort.Versatile Use: They work great for everyday cleaning or for tackling spills and messes. It's a versatile solution for keeping your floors in top condition.Time-Saving: Swiffer Sweeper Wet Mopping Pad Refills significantly reduce the time and effort needed for floor cleaning. You can maintain a clean home without spending hours on it.In conclusion, Swiffer Sweeper Wet Mopping Pad Refills with Febreze Lavender Scent are a five-star product that combines convenience, effectiveness, and a touch of freshness in your cleaning routine. They make floor cleaning a breeze and leave your home smelling wonderful. If you want spotless, great-smelling floors without the fuss, these mopping pads are a must-have. 🌸🧹🏡

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweeping Serenity - Lavender Bliss for Effortless Cleaning!
reviews.reviewText: These Swiffer Sweeper Wet Mopping Pad Refills have transformed my cleaning routine into a delightful and serene experience, thanks to their intoxicating and delicious lavender scent.What sets these refills apart is the enchanting aroma of lavender that fills the air as I glide them across my floors. The scent is simply divine, creating a soothing and calming atmosphere while I tackle the task at hand. It's a subtle touch of luxury that elevates the cleaning process to a whole new level.Beyond the heavenly scent, the performance of these pad refills is exceptional. They effortlessly capture dirt, dust, and grime, leaving my floors spotless and gleaming. The textured design of the pads enhances their effectiveness, ensuring a thorough clean with each swipe.The convenience of these refills is another standout feature. They easily attach to the Swiffer Sweeper, making it a breeze to replace and continue with the cleaning process. The pads are durable and long-lasting, providing multiple uses before needing to be replaced.I appreciate the attention to detail that Swiffer has put into these mopping pad refills. They are gentle on various types of floors, effectively cleaning without causing any damage or leaving residue behind. They are a reliable and efficient solution that simplifies the cleaning routine.If you're seeking a delightful and effective cleaning experience, these Swiffer Sweeper Wet Mopping Pad Refills with the enticing scent of lavender are a must-have. Immerse yourself in the tranquil ambiance they create while achieving spotless floors. Embrace the sweeping serenity and transform your cleaning routine into a blissful ritual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always like my floors done with swiffer
reviews.reviewText: Smells nice, cleans great on hardwood. However, the delivery woman heaved them up onto my porch from the driveway, and broke the package, and THE SWIFFER BOX WAS OFF, AND leaked all over onto the inside of the box, AND DAMAGED the nose spray also. I saw the action on my ring dooebell. The whole order was damaged, dented, and leaking. All wet INSIDE when i opened it. I heard it hit my door hard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality good, not long lasting
reviews.reviewText: Will clean a small room but dries up fast, otherwise cleans well and good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So effective and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: These cloths are a game changer. No more mops, buckets, squeezing sponges or rags. Just put these on their mop, do a pass or two and throw away the used cloth. The floors dry pretty quickly after use and the scent is quite pleasant (if you like lavender)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best wipes to ever use
reviews.reviewText: It cleans alot of area having the area smelling very fresh and clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value but don't get with food
reviews.reviewText: I use these all the time. They work and smell good too. But something happened to this container when they shipped it. I think the blue plastic container cracked during shipment, then drained the excess liquid all over the box. I bet the Amazon truck smelled nice too. The cloths still seem wet though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product for people with pets
reviews.reviewText: I love these mops sheets - I have 3 indoor cats and they are messy - they puke - they shed hair - and while i vacuum everyday - still - using these are awesome - keeps my house super clean (i have italian tiles throughout) leaves a nice shine - no streaks and picks up all debris and hair. I just love it. I wish they made these w some clorox as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice smell and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the smell and it works as expected. Cleans pretty well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 1, 2024

reviews.reviewText: ME GUSTAN MUCHO LIMPIAN MUY BIEN!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing mop refills, I hope they were more often in stock
reviews.reviewText: They are amazing to use. In the past to save on the mops, I have tried using cloth or paper insert inside the Swiffer mop attachment. But it comes nowhere close to the original.And we are back with this.I am able to clean one extremely dusty room or 2 non dusty rooms with one refill.But the only problem is, these are always out of stock and hard to find. I hope they do something about that or the customers will switch to mops of other brands, inspite of this being such great quality.Definitely buy and stock them up if you are looking for these refills and were able to find it here.
